when i do gksu "update-manager -c": it loads up and says 6.10 is out, i try to upgrade, and then i get the error "authenticating the upgrade failed. there may be a problem with the network or the server."
gpg --keyserver subkeys.pgp.net --recv KEY!    and then   gpg --export --armor KEY! | sudo apt-key add -
